subtasks: Identifying garden plants (e.g., Comet Sunat, Snappy Nairobi, African Blue Basil)
Visiting a local herb farm (Jackers Herb Farm)

tasks.task: Plant Care and Preparing for Winter
subtasks: Pruning and repotting plants (e.g., water pepper plant)
Potting up plants with appropriate soil mix
Managing tender plants for indoor wintering
Reflecting on plant growth and care (e.g., peppery leaves, Ornamental oregano)
Planning for next seasons (e.g., taking cuttings for future growth)
